io.nem.symbol.sdk.infrastructure

Class RepositoryFactoryBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.nem.symbol.sdk.infrastructure.RepositoryFactoryBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RepositoryFactory, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RepositoryFactoryOkHttpImpl, RepositoryFactoryVertxImpl

    public abstract class RepositoryFactoryBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements RepositoryFactory
    Base class of all the RepositoryFactory. It handles common functions like resolving configuration.

      • getNetworkType

        public io.reactivex.Observable<NetworkType> getNetworkType()
        Specified by:
        getNetworkType in interface RepositoryFactory
        Returns:
        the network type of the network. It uses the user configured network type if provided, if not, the value will be resolved from the server. This method is cached, the server is only called the first time if necessary.
        See Also:
        RepositoryFactoryConfiguration

      • getGenerationHash

        public io.reactivex.Observable<java.lang.String> getGenerationHash()
        Specified by:
        getGenerationHash in interface RepositoryFactory
        Returns:
        the generation hash used to sign transactions. It uses the user configured generation hash if provided, if not, the value will be resolved from the server. Value retrieved from the node/info endpoint. This method is cached, the server is only called the first time.
        See Also:
        RepositoryFactoryConfiguration

      • getBaseUrl

        protected java.lang.String getBaseUrl()

      • getNetworkCurrency

        public io.reactivex.Observable<Currency> getNetworkCurrency()
        Specified by:
        getNetworkCurrency in interface RepositoryFactory
        Returns:
        the configured network currency configuration like "cat.currency", "nem.xem " and "symbol.xym". This method uses the user configured properties if provided. If it's not provided, it resolves the configuration from the /network/properties endpoint. This method is cached, the server is only called the first time.
        See Also:
        CurrencyService, RepositoryFactoryConfiguration

      • getHarvestCurrency

        public io.reactivex.Observable<Currency> getHarvestCurrency()
        Specified by:
        getHarvestCurrency in interface RepositoryFactory
        Returns:
        the configured harvest currency configuration like "cat.harvest". This method uses the user configured properties if provided. If it's not provided, it resolves the configuration from the /network/properties endpoint. This method is cached, the server is only called the first time. The network currency configuration
        See Also:
        CurrencyService, RepositoryFactoryConfiguration

      • getNetworkCurrencies

        public io.reactivex.Observable<NetworkCurrencies> getNetworkCurrencies()
        Specified by:
        getNetworkCurrencies in interface RepositoryFactory
        Returns:
        the configured harvest currencies configuration like "cat.currency" or "cat.harvest". This method uses the user configured properties if provided. If it's not provided, it resolves the configuration * from the /network/properties endpoint. This method is cached, the server is only called the * first time. The network currency configuration
        See Also:
        CurrencyService, RepositoryFactoryConfiguration

        Returns:
